sn14.6:1.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you the diversity of elements.
sn14.6:1.4: And what is the diversity of elements?
sn14.6:1.5: The sight element, the sound element, the smell element, the taste element, the touch element, and the thought element.
sn14.6:1.6: This is called the diversity of elements.”
